Logistic Regression

This section covers Logistic Regression for classification tasks.

Key Concepts

  • Sigmoid function
  • Cost function for logistic regression
  • Gradient descent
  • Multiclass classification

Mathematical Foundation

Sigmoid function: \(g(z) = \frac{1}{1 + e^{-z}}\)

Hypothesis function: \(h_\theta(x) = g(\theta^T x) = \frac{1}{1 + e^{-\theta^T x}}\)

Cost function: \(J(\theta) = \frac{1}{m} \sum_{i=1}^{m} [-y^{(i)} \log(h_\theta(x^{(i)})) - (1-y^{(i)}) \log(1-h_\theta(x^{(i)}))]\)
